text: 63. onsider the following code (Assume size of pointer be tes): Consider the following code (A i f poi be 4 by #include<stdio.h> int main() { inta[] ={1,2,3,4}; int *p = &a+1; printf("%d", *(p-1)); return 0; } Solution: *p will point the address which is after address of 4 becuase we are adding 1 in &a so it will be incremented by size of array.
